name: BigQuery Available Slot Totals Exceeded

options.escalation_message:
BigQuery Slot Capacity is still too high!
Please resolve [here](https://console.cloud.google.com/bigquery/admin/reservations;region=us/capacity-commitments?project=handshake-production)
or ping another on caller if you are unsure how to proceed.
These slots incur additional costs for us."
@slack-data-platform-failures
